title: Total Coke Ovens Under Construction for United States
notes:
Data Covers The Total Of Construction Of Beehive And By-Product Coke Ovens. Beehive Coke Ovens Should Probable Be Subracted From 1940 On Because These Are Probably Old Ovens Rebuilt For Temporary Use To Meet Peak Demands. Source: Data Derived From Minerals Yearbook, Successive Issues.

This NBER data series a01161a appears on the NBER website in Chapter 1 at http://www.nber.org/databases/macrohistory/contents/chapter01.html.

NBER Indicator: a01161a
